content:
[Ohio Senate 2024 | Columbus Metro (Franklin County - Upper Arlington/Dublin) | P4: M, 51, OSU professor, Grandview, Biden 2020, policy wonk]
Q: Several of you have mentioned the gap between Columbus and the rest of Ohio. How does that affect this race?
"But his party is associated with coastal elites. That's the bind."
participant_profile: M, 51, OSU professor, Grandview, Biden 2020, policy wonk
preceding_moderator_q: Several of you have mentioned the gap between Columbus and the rest of Ohio. How does that affect this race?
